languages.text: {n}Видение карающего божества обрывается. Боль мгновенно уходит, а металл отпускает вашу ладонь, целую и невредимую. Мельтешащие символы мгновенно замирают и начинают медленно угасать. Последним гаснет символ "Мор", навсегда исчезая с глади плиты.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Видение обрывается также внезапно, как и началось. Боль мгновенно уходит, а металл отпускает вашу ладонь, целую и невредимую. Мельтешащие символы мгновенно замирают и начинают медленно угасать. Последним гаснет символ "Мор", навсегда исчезая с глади плиты.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The vision of the vengeful deity ends. The pain subsides at once, and the metal releases your hand unscathed. The flickering symbols freeze instantly and slowly begin to fade. The symbol for Pestilence is the last to disappear from the slab's surface forever.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Видение карающего божества обрывается. Боль мгновенно уходит, а металл отпускает вашу ладонь, целую и невредимую. Мельтешащие символы мгновенно замирают и начинают медленно угасать. Последним гаснет символ "Мор", навсегда исчезая с глади плиты.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The vision of the vengeful deity ends. The pain subsides at once, and the metal releases your hand. It's unharmed. The flickering symbols freeze at once and start fading slowly. The Pestilence symbol is the last to go, forever disappearing from the slab's surface.{/n}

{n}The vision of the vengeful deity ends. The pain subsides at once, and the metal releases your hand. It's unharmed. The flickering symbols freeze at once and start fading slowly. The Pestilence symbol is the last to go, forever disappearing from the slab's surface.{/n}

{n}The vision of the vengeful deity ends. The pain subsides at once, and the metal releases your hand unscathed. The flickering symbols freeze at once and slowly begin to fade. The symbol for Pestilence is the last to disappear from the slab's surface forever.{/n}

{n}The vision of the vengeful deity ends. The pain subsides at once, and the metal releases your hand unscathed. The flickering symbols freeze at once and slowly begin to fade. The symbol for Pestilence is the last to disappear from the slab's surface forever.{/n}

{n}The vision of the vengeful deity ends. The pain subsides at once, and the metal releases your hand unscathed. The flickering symbols freeze instantly and slowly begin to fade. The symbol for Pestilence is the last to disappear from the slab's surface forever.{/n}

{n}The vision of the vengeful deity ends. The pain subsides at once, and the metal releases your hand unscathed. The flickering symbols freeze instantly and slowly begin to fade. The symbol for Pestilence is the last to disappear from the slab's surface forever.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La visión del dios vengativo termina. El dolor cesa al momento y el metal libera tu mano. Está ilesa. Los símbolos intermitentes se detienen al momento y empiezan a desvanecerse. El último en desaparecer permanentemente es el de Pestilencia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vision of the vengeful deity ends. The pain subsides at once, and the metal releases your hand unscathed. The flickering symbols freeze instantly and slowly begin to fade. The symbol for Pestilence is the last to disappear from the slab's surface forever.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La visión del dios vengativo termina. El dolor cesa al momento y el metal libera tu mano. Está ilesa. Los símbolos intermitentes se detienen al momento y empiezan a desvanecerse. El último en desaparecer permanentemente es el de Pestilencia.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La vision de la divinité vengeresse prend fin. La douleur s'estompe immédiatement et le métal relâche votre main intacte, puis les symboles vacillants s'immobilisent soudain avant de disparaître lentement. Celui de pestilence est le dernier à s'effacer à jamais de la surface de la dalle.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vision of the vengeful deity ends. The pain subsides at once, and the metal releases your hand unscathed. The flickering symbols freeze instantly and slowly begin to fade. The symbol for Pestilence is the last to disappear from the slab's surface forever.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La vision de la divinité vengeresse prend fin. La douleur s'estompe immédiatement et le métal relâche votre main intacte, puis les symboles vacillants s'immobilisent avant de disparaître lentement. Celui de pestilence est le dernier à s'effacer à jamais de la surface de la dalle.{/n}

languages.text: {n}復讐に燃える神のビジョンは終わった。痛みはすぐに和らぎ、手は金属から無傷のまま解放された。揺らめくシンボルは一瞬で静止し、ゆっくりと消え始めた。最後に平板の表面から消えてなくなったのは、「疫病」を表すシンボルだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vision of the vengeful deity ends. The pain subsides at once, and the metal releases your hand unscathed. The flickering symbols freeze instantly and slowly begin to fade. The symbol for Pestilence is the last to disappear from the slab's surface forever.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}復讐に燃える神のビジョンは終わった。痛みはすぐに和らぎ、手は金属から無傷のまま解放された。揺らめくシンボルは一瞬で静止し、ゆっくりと消え始めた。最後に平板の表面から消えてなくなったのは、「疫病」を表すシンボルだった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}愤怒神明的幻象结束了，疼痛立刻消失了，金属板松开了你的手。你浑身上下毫发无损，原本闪烁的符号也瞬间凝滞在了金属板上，渐渐消逝。最后一个从金属板上消失的，是代表“瘟疫”的符号。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vision of the vengeful deity ends. The pain subsides at once, and the metal releases your hand unscathed. The flickering symbols freeze instantly and slowly begin to fade. The symbol for Pestilence is the last to disappear from the slab's surface forever.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}愤怒神明的幻象结束了，疼痛立刻消失了，金属板松开了你的手。你浑身上下毫发无损，原本闪烁的符号也凝滞在了金属板上，渐渐消逝。代表“瘟疫”的符号，是最后一个从金属板上消失的。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Vision der rachsüchtigen Gottheit endet. Der Schmerz lässt augenblicklich nach, und das Metall gibt deine unverletzte Hand frei. Die flackernden Symbole frieren augenblicklich ein und beginnen zu verblassen. Das Symbol für Pestilenz verschwindet als letztes von der Oberfläche der Tafel, für immer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vision of the vengeful deity ends. The pain subsides at once, and the metal releases your hand unscathed. The flickering symbols freeze instantly and slowly begin to fade. The symbol for Pestilence is the last to disappear from the slab's surface forever.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Vision der rachsüchtigen Gottheit endet. Der Schmerz lässt augenblicklich nach, und das Metall gibt deine unverletzte Hand frei. Die flackernden Symbole frieren augenblicklich ein und beginnen zu verblassen. Das Symbol für Pestilenz verschwindet als letztes von der Oberfläche der Tafel, für immer.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kin dolu ilahın görüsü sona eriyor. Acı bir kez daha hafifliyor ve metal, elini zarar vermeden serbest bırakıyor. Yanıp sönen semboller anında donuyor ve yavaşça kapanmaya başlıyor. Tabakanın yüzeyinden son yok olan sembol, Hastalık sembolü oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vision of the vengeful deity ends. The pain subsides at once, and the metal releases your hand unscathed. The flickering symbols freeze instantly and slowly begin to fade. The symbol for Pestilence is the last to disappear from the slab's surface forever.{/n}
